wikipedia_page.main: Vice Admiral Sir Timothy Pentreath McClement,  (born 16 May 1951) is a former Royal Navy officer who served as Deputy Commander-in-Chief Fleet from 2004 to 2006.

response: Between 1999 and 2001 she was commanded by Captain Timothy McClement.
* Vice Admiral Sir Timothy McClement, June 2004–Oct 2006
*Vice Admiral Sir Timothy McClement KCB OBE (1951– )
